title: Beauty Report with Amy Morrison 10.05.2017 - 07 PM
description:
This week on the Beauty Report, we're celebrating Amy's birthday with lots of fun and treats. On the show this week is Treets, Deborah Lippmann, Dr. Graf and more! Amy shares her latest beauty tips and trends. From hair and makeup to skincare and fragrance, it's all new every week. Watch every Thursday 7 pm ET and 4 pm. 

*Prices shown on the previously recorded video may not represent the current price. Visit http://www.hsn.com to view the current selling price. And shop HSN's Beauty Report!
